motion-loading-delay-default.comment: The amount of time to wait before showing a loading indicator or announcing a loading state to assistive technologies.

original.comment: The amount of time to wait before showing a loading indicator or announcing a loading state to assistive technologies.

motion-loading-delay-default.name: motion-loading-delay-default

motion-spinner-duration-rotation.comment: The amount of time it takes the "Spinner" loading indicator to make a full 360deg rotation

motion-spinner-duration-rotation.name: motion-spinner-duration-rotation

motion-skeletonLoader-shimmer-duration-s.comment: The amount of times it takes the "shimmer" effect to go from the start (left) of the skeleton loader to the end (right)
